dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.compet.CompetitiveTier
dataStructure.description:
A classification of a Competitor, such as by size, product lines offered, and so forth.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CompetitiveTier

child.name: size
child.description:
How big the Competitor is, such as small, medium, large, compared to other Competitors.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: size

child.name: perspective
child.description:
How the CompetitiveTier is viewed, such as vertical or horizontal.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: perspective

child.name: perspectiveCharacteristic
child.description:
A feature or quality that further describes the perspective recognizable, such as consumer, business, carrier, size, usage, customer, and so forth. For example, a consumer vertical market perspective.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: perspectiveCharacteristic

child.name: competitorTier
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CompetitiveTierClassifies

This association end is optional
child.label: competitorTier

child.name: productLine
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ProductLineDefines

This association end is optional
child.label: productLine
